subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: In the year since Keegan Bradley won the P.G.A. Championship as a rookie, any misgivings that the long-driving Bradley might be a one-hit wonder have vanished.
snippet: In the year since Keegan Bradley won the P.G.A. Championship as a rookie, any misgivings that the long-driving Bradley might be a one-hit wonder have vanished.
